typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pipelineRunId as string
}
source(output(
		seq as string,
		first as string,
		last as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		phone as string,
		postal as string,
		countryCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Blob
source(output(
		code as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: false) ~> CountryLookup
AddImportIdentifier assert(expectTrue(!isNull(email), false, 'assertEmailRequired', null, 'Email is required.'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(gender), false, 'assertGenderRequired', null, 'Gender is required.'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(first), false, 'assertFirstNameRequired', null, 'First Name is required.'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(last), false, 'assertLastNameRequired', null, 'Last Name is required.')) ~> Validate
Validate split(!isError(),
	disjoint: false) ~> SeparateErrorRows@(CosmosDB, CosmosDBErrors)
SeparateErrorRows@CosmosDB alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert1
SeparateErrorRows@CosmosDBErrors alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert2
LookupCountry derive(ImportIdentifier = $pipelineRunId) ~> AddImportIdentifier
Blob, CountryLookup lookup(countryCode == code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
AllowUpsert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'document',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CosmosDB
AllowUpsert2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'document',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CosmosDBErrors
